general.label: Define Buy X Get Y Free/Discounted Products and Criteria

label1.label: info
label1.comment: This extension can create a Buy X Get Y free sales promotion, where a bonus product Y is automatically added to the cart if the customer buys a quantity of product X. Please ensure your product Y is a simple product.

productx_product_id.label: Product X Product ID:
productx_product_id.comment: ID number of product X, use comma seperated values to define multiple products, i.e. 131,104,2010.

producty_product_id.label: Product Y Product ID:
producty_product_id.comment: ID number of product Y (bonus product), use comma seperated values to define multiple products, i.e. 132,105,2011. Product Y must be a simple product and the ID configured here must be unique.

productx_required_qty.label: Minimum quantity of product X required to qualify for Product Y:
productx_required_qty.comment: Minumum quantity of product X that must be in the cart to qualify for product Y. Use comma seperated values for multiple products, i.e. 5,10,2. Default it left blank is 1.

productx_limit_qty.label: Maximum quantity of product X required to qualify for Product Y:
productx_limit_qty.comment: Maximum quantity of product X that must be in the cart to qualify for product Y. Use comma seperated values for multiple products, i.e. 5,10,15 use 0 for no limit.

producty_description.label: Description for bonus or free product:
producty_description.comment: Description of Product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products. i.e. Free Gift,Bonus Product,Special Bonus. If left blank default is Free Gift.

excluded_customer_groups.label: Exclude Customer Groups:
excluded_customer_groups.comment: These customer groups will be excluded from all offers. Use comma seperated list i.e. 1,2,3

label2.comment: Buy X Get Y Free - for support visit blog.gaiterjones.com.

general.label: Define Spend X Get Y Free/Discounted Products and Criteria

label1.comment: This extension can create a Spend X Get Y free sales promotion, where a bonus product Y is automatically added to the cart if the customer spends a qualifying amount on a single order. Please ensure your product Y is a simple product.

spend_producty_product_id.label: Product Y Product ID:
spend_producty_product_id.comment: ID number of product Y (bonus product), use comma seperated values to define multiple products, i.e. 132,105,2011. Product Y must be a simple product and the ID configured here must be unique.

spend_cart_total_required.label: Cart minimum sub total required to qualify for Product Y:
spend_cart_total_required.comment: Cart minimum base currency subtotal required to qualify for product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products, i.e. 50,100,200

spend_cart_y_limit.label: Cart MAXIMUM sub total required to qualify for Product Y:
spend_cart_y_limit.comment: Cart maximum base currency subtotal required to qualify for product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products, if empty default is 0.

spend_cart_total_required.label: Cart MINIMUM sub total required to qualify for Product Y:
spend_cart_total_required.comment: Cart minimum subtotal required to qualify for product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products, i.e. 50,100,200

spend_producty_description.label: Description for bonus or free product:
spend_producty_description.comment: Description of Product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products. i.e. Free Gift,Bonus Product,Special Bonus. If left blank default is Free Gift.

spend_customer_group_id.label: Customer group ID:
spend_customer_group_id.comment: ID number of the customer group customer must be a member of to qualify for offer, use comma seperated values for multiple offers. If left blank offer applies to all groups. For multiple groups specify group1,group2 e.g. 0,2 for group 0 and group 2.

spend_excluded_products_id.label: Products excluded from this offer:
spend_excluded_products_id.comment: ID number of any products you want to exclude from this offer, use comma seperated values for multiple products.

spend_notify_excluded_products.label: Notify customer when products excluded from offer:
spend_notify_excluded_products.comment: Set to YES to notify customer when products are excluded from this offer.

label2.comment: Spend X Get Y Free - for support visit blog.gaiterjones.com.

send_alert_email.label: Send alert emails:
send_alert_email.comment: Send emails to the general email address when Product Y cannot be added to a cart due to errors, low stock etc.

allow_duplicate_product_y.label: Allow duplicate product Y:
allow_duplicate_product_y.comment: Allow duplicate product Y, used for testing only.

general.label: Define Coupon X Get Y Free/Discounted Products and Criteria

label1.comment: This extension can create a sales promotion, where a bonus product Y is added to the cart if the customer applies a promotional coupon code. Please ensure your product Y is a simple product.

coupon_producty_product_id.label: Product Y Product ID:
coupon_producty_product_id.comment: ID number of product Y (bonus product), use comma seperated values to define multiple products, i.e. 132,105,2011. Product Y must be a simple product and the ID configured here must be unique.

coupon_required.label: Coupon required to qualify for Product Y:
coupon_required.comment: Name of the coupon required required to qualify for product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple coupons. Coupon must be valid and configured in Magento under Promotions.

coupon_producty_description.label: Description for bonus or free product:
coupon_producty_description.comment: Description of Product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products. i.e. Free Gift,Bonus Product,Special Bonus. If left blank default is Free Gift.

coupon_cart_total_required.label: Cart sub total required to qualify for Product Y:
coupon_cart_total_required.comment: Cart base currency subtotal required to qualify for product Y when coupon is valid, use comma seperated values for multiple products, i.e. 50,100,200. If left blank default is 0, i.e. disabled.

label2.comment: Coupon X Get Y Free - for support visit blog.gaiterjones.com.

general.label: Define Category X Get Y Free/Discounted Products and Criteria

label1.comment: This extension can create a sales promotion, where a bonus/free product Y is added to the cart if a product in the cart is a member of a specific category. You can also create an inactive dummy category i.e. BuyXGetYFree and add products to this category that qualify for the promotion. Please ensure your product Y is a simple product.

category_producty_product_id.label: Product Y Product ID:
category_producty_product_id.comment: ID number of product Y (bonus product), use comma seperated values to define multiple products, i.e. 132,105,2011. Product Y must be a simple product and the ID configured here must be unique.

category_id.label: Category ID :
category_id.comment: ID number of Category X. Products in this category will qualify for bonus product Y. Use comma seperated values for multiple categories.

category_producty_max_qty.label: Max Number of Product Y allowed in cart:
category_producty_max_qty.comment: The maximum number of Bonus products allowed in the cart, default if left blank is 1.

category_productx_min_qty.label: Quantity of product X required to qualify for product Y:
category_productx_min_qty.comment: The quantity of Product X in cart required to qualify for product Y, default if left blank is 1.

category_producty_step.label: Product X Step:
category_producty_step.comment: Step to add multiple product Y. i.e. for every 6 product X get 1 product Y free then the step would be 6. Leave blank to default to 1.

category_producty_description.label: Description for bonus or free product:
category_producty_description.comment: Description of Product Y, use comma seperated values for multiple products. i.e. Free Gift,Bonus Product,Special Bonus. If left blank default is Free Gift.

label2.comment: Category X Get Y Free - for support visit blog.gaiterjones.com.
